steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c1v25","text":"Place a 50 mL conical tube in a tube rack.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eri4","text":"Vigorously shake the sample to re-suspend solids. Immediately move on to Step 3.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
